Reviews.Title: “Great for the price and location”
Reviews.Author: ejp2003
Reviews.Content: comfort lodge basic hotel nathan rd exceeded expectations unlike photos ive seen stories read expecting impossibly tight uncomfortable thick mattresses 2 double beds super clean modest difficult finding location theres signage whatsoever enter knights garden office walk 2nd floor stairway left theres door hit doorbell staff helpful spoke english allowed bags office checked left town beyond finding steps deal lot luggage tired coming airport elevator hard move youre flying hkg staff bus stop hotel convenient taking airport express costs

Reviews.Title: “Basic, clean, safe, affordable”
Reviews.Author: UsuallyFarFromHome
Reviews.Content: hotel apartments converted hotel plenty security clean kept easy check hk100 key deposit ok didnt expect stairs faster elevator helpful staff speak english internet wifi time value money bit tough signage look address marked overlook looking hotel entrance instead passage apartment building street tak hing nathan rd block east near jordan mtr station location convenient terms getting

Reviews.Title: “recommended...good location...friendly staffs”
Reviews.Author: Aissa C
Reviews.Content: paul help hes friendly approachable funny nice filipina staffs nice twin bedroom fine regarding kept tidy times 3 minwalk jordan station 5 mins walk temple night market 2 stations ladies marketthe bus stop airport meters rom hotelvery safe night

Reviews.Title: “Great location, clean but small”
Reviews.Author: PsychedelicSocks
Reviews.Content: traveled mum short shopping trip lodge bit hard youre time hotel sign facing street location minutes jordan mtr station food outlets convenience store nearby werent spending time basics sleeping showering sufficient allowing save money accommodation housekeeping staff friendly speak english

Reviews.Title: “Best location and excellent guesthouse”
Reviews.Author: Helenthereef
Reviews.Content: guesthouse central amenities nathan street walking distance temple street night market ladies street market easy underground rail trips flower bird goldfish markets quiet peaceful couldnt guesthouses emailed replied promptly directions able payment line truly confirmed booking reception 24 hours day staff polite friendly helpful single en suite advertised neat clean newly decorated openable window ac fridge tv kettle slight hiccups additional charge arrival due incorrect exchange rate website extra top prepaid charge inroom internet acess bought cable explained feel rip im heading hong kong couple weeks ill using comfort lodge

Reviews.Title: “Totally misnamed and a rip off. I should have known when I realised it has no name up”
Reviews.Author: audirick
Reviews.Content: chose location price internet hotel booking agency offered advise amount front credit card details taxi driver didnt didnt found name building nice security aimed apartment block lift sleazy assortment studio poor condition booked double twin adjacent building jammed poor quality fitments ceiling paint peeling aircon badly fitted hole wall beds clean hospital type worst accom slept english channels extremely tv set vanity basin miniature kitchen shower toilet price 100usd day 1600 hkd 2 days cell type advise trip advisor

HotelInfo.Name: Comfort Lodge Hong Kong
